thread.title: Selena K Butcher
thread.title_full: SimplyOz.com reviewed by Selena K Butcher

author: Selena K Butcher
title: Selena K Butcher
text: I have been ordering from Simply Australian for years now. My items have always arrived in pristine condition and they have never gotten an order wrong. I love their clearance section however sometimes they are out of items that I want. I love the coupon that they offer and the fact that it seems like they care.
